About Us

Our Story

  • 2013

    BowTie

    BowTie is developed to provide safer, faster, zero maintenance sites.

  • 2015

    Municipal Experts

    BowTie uses our expertise to work with the City of Albuquerque.

  • 2016

    CivicMaker

    With the power of the BowTie platform, CivicMaker was created to help municipalities better serve their citizens with fast, safer, no maintenance sites.

  • 2017 & Beyond

    The Future

    CivicMaker is leading the future of municipal websites.

Dedication by the Numbers

Team completely dedicated to your success

Your Success is CivicMaker’s Success

Local government has evolved into the driving force for communities. Today cities, counties, and states supply the knowledge and resources behind dynamic economic and cultural changes from entrepreneurship to healthcare to community programs. CivicMaker is your partner in delivering unmatched community support and resources. Through CivicMaker, citizens will see the future of websites and experience your local government resources and knowledge like never before. Communities are changing and CivicMaker is your local government’s solution for leading the charge.

Innovation is our Core

Citizens don’t have patience for yesterday’s tools and local governments don’t have a need for out of date solutions. CivicMaker is leading the revolution of community-focused technology and websites. Our team expertly weaves years of experience, award winning work, experience building at small and large scale, modern design methodologies, and government experience to create leading websites for cities, counties, and states. Experience a true website design and development company, as our project managers guide you through an evolution in your online presence.

Customer Support

At CivicMaker, we view customer satisfaction as a key goal of every project. We offer unmatched support, direct access to company leadership, and a commitment to meeting the needs of every clients.
